page.title: 15LEISURE IN LANGHOLM
page.content: TO{FISH}IN THE{RIVER ESK}YOU NEED A TICKET WHICH COSTS Â£84 A SEASON.THE FISH YOU CATCH ARE{SALMON,BROWN TROUT AND,IN PARTICULAR,{SEA TROUT}. {SHOOTING }IS POPULAR ON{WHITA HILL}AND SOUTH OF WHITA HILL.PEOPLE SHOOT {PHEASANT}AND{GROUSE }MOSTLY.THE GROUSE SEASON IS THE 12th OF AUGUST TO THE 10th OF DECEMBER.THE TICKET COSTS Â£300 PER DAY FOR 140 GROUSE. THER ARE MANY {CLUBS }AND{SOCIETES }IN LANGHOLM INCLUDING {GUIDES,BROWNIES, {CUBS,SCOUTS,RANGERS, BOYS' {BRIGADE,YOUTH CLUB AND GYMNASTICS WHICH ARE ALL FOR CHILDREN.FOR ADULTS THERE ARE THE {FREE MASONS, {ROTARY,OPERA AND DRAMATIC, {WOMANS'GUILD,W.R.I.,AS WELL {AS DANCING AND AEROBIC CLUBS.} LANGHOLM HAS MANY MUSIC CLUBS AND SOCIETIES SUCH AS{FIDDLE,PIPE, FLUTE } AND {BRASS.
